content: crochet drops christmas snow flake in cotton viscose drops extra 0-520 materials drops cotton viscose from garnstudio 50 g color no 01 white 1 ball of cotton viscose makes approx 10 snow flakes drops crochet hook size 2 5 mm \ us c/2 drops mother-of-pearl button no 541 1 per snow flake curtain ring diameter approx 3 cm \ 1 1 per snow flake uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3924&cid=19
